授業目的: スヌーピー4コマ漫画を英語で読み、語彙力・文法力を強化しながら、アメリカ文化を学ぶ。
到達目標:
スヌーピー4コマ漫画を通して、生きた英語表現を学び、日常生活で使えることを到達目標とする。
また、アメリカ文化に対する理解を深めることができる。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: 演習・グループディスカッション

第1回: Introduction & Unit 1:Did he tell you to stop winking at girls?
第2回: Unit 2: I could have had an older sister to look up to.
第3回: Unit 3: Why don't we just keep it our little secret?
第4回: Unit 4: All right, gang, it's time to start our spring training!
第5回: Unit 5 How about an hour's worth of doughnuts?
第6回: Unit 6: I imagine the life of a surgeon can be very rewarding.
第7回:
Unit 7: I forget her in fourteen doughnuts!

第8回:
Unit 9: She asked me to fill ou an accident report!

第9回:
Unit 11: Not used to dealing with a perfectionins, huh, ma'am?
Unit 12: I think you'd look ridiculous wearing Mickey Mouse shoes!

Unit 13: They say that grandparents like to spoil their grandchildren.
Unit 14: It't gratifying to have a dog greet you when you get home from school.

Unit 15: I'm surprised that no one has thought of doing this.
Unit 16: Unless you can think of some way to open the can yourself.
第12回:

Unit 18: That's why I'm taking this map to school.
